com.cyc.query

Interface QueryAnswers<E extends QueryAnswer>

  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<E>, Iterable<E>, List<E>

    public interface QueryAnswers<E extends QueryAnswer>
extends List<E>
    A list of answers for a Query. A QueryAnswers collection represents a snapshot of the answers found by the query at the time that Query.getAnswers() was called; for running queries, subsequent calls to Query.getAnswers() may return different instances of QueryAnswers (with different numbers of answers) as additional answers are found.

    • Method Detail

      • getBindingsForVariable

        <O> List<O> getBindingsForVariable(Variable var)
        Returns a List of all the values for one variable from all the answers to a query. If the query has only one variable, it may be more convenient to call getBindingsForOnlyVariable().
        Type Parameters:
        O - The expected class of the value
        Parameters:
        var - The variable for which the bindings are sought
        Returns:
        a list of all values for one variable from all answers to a query
        See Also:
        getBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getUniqueBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getOnlyBindingForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getOnlyBindingForOnlyVariable()

      • getBindingsForOnlyVariable

        <O> List<O> getBindingsForOnlyVariable()
                                throws QueryRuntimeException
        Returns a List of all the values from all the answers to a single-variable query.

        This method specifically expects the query to return bindings for exactly one variable; the existence of more than variable will be interpreted as an error which will result in a QueryRuntimeException. If the query has more than one variable, use getBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable) instead.

        Type Parameters:
        O - The expected class of the value
        Returns:
        a list of all the values from all the answers to a single-variable query
        Throws:
        QueryRuntimeException - if the query contains more than one variable
        See Also:
        getBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getUniqueBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getOnlyBindingForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getOnlyBindingForOnlyVariable()

      • getUniqueBindingsForVariable

        <O> Set<O> getUniqueBindingsForVariable(Variable var)
        Returns a Set of all unique values for one variable from all the answers to a query. If the query has only one variable, it may be more convenient to call getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable().
        Type Parameters:

      • getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable

        <O> Set<O> getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable()
                                     throws QueryRuntimeException
        Returns a Set of all unique values from all the answers to a single-variable query.

        This method specifically expects the query to return bindings for exactly one variable; the existence of more than variable will be interpreted as an error which will result in a QueryRuntimeException. If the query has more than one variable, use getUniqueBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable) instead.

        Type Parameters:
        O - The expected class of the value
        Returns:
        a list of all the values from all the answers to a single-variable query
        Throws:
        QueryRuntimeException - if the query contains more than one variable
        See Also:
        getBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getUniqueBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getOnlyBindingForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getOnlyBindingForOnlyVariable()

      • getOnlyAnswer

        Optional<E> getOnlyAnswer()
                   throws QueryRuntimeException
        Returns an Optional containing the sole answer (if present) to a query.

        This method specifically expects the query to return no more than one answer, and will interpret the existence of more than one answer as an error which will result in a QueryRuntimeException. If no answers have been found, the Optional will be empty.

        Returns:
        an Optional containing the sole answer to a query, or empty if no answer has been found
        Throws:
        QueryRuntimeException
        See Also:
        getBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getUniqueBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getOnlyBindingForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable)

      • getOnlyBindingForVariable

        <O> Optional<O> getOnlyBindingForVariable(Variable var)
                                   throws QueryRuntimeException
        Returns an Optional containing the single value for a single variable from the sole answer (if present) to a query.

        This method specifically expects the query to return no more than one answer, and will interpret the existence of more than one answer as an error which will result in a QueryRuntimeException. If no answers have been found, the Optional will be empty.

        Type Parameters:
        O - The expected class of the value.
        Parameters:
        var - The variable for which the binding is sought.
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the single value for a single variable from the sole answer to a query, or empty if no answer has been found.
        Throws:
        QueryRuntimeException
        See Also:
        getBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getUniqueBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getOnlyBindingForOnlyVariable()

      • getOnlyBindingForOnlyVariable

        <O> Optional<O> getOnlyBindingForOnlyVariable()
                                       throws QueryRuntimeException
        Returns an Optional containing the single value from the sole answer (if present) to a single-variable query.

        Like getOnlyBindingForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), this method specifically expects the query to return no more than one answer, and will interpret the existence of more than one answer as an error which will result in a QueryRuntimeException. If no answers have been found, the Optional will be empty.

        Furthermore, this method specifically expects the query to return bindings for exactly one variable; the existence of more than variable will be interpreted as an error which will result in a QueryRuntimeException. If the query has more than one variable, use getOnlyBindingForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable) instead.

        Type Parameters:
        O - The expected class of the value.
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the single value for a single variable from the sole answer to a query, or empty if no answer has been found.
        Throws:
        QueryRuntimeException
        See Also:
        getBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getUniqueBindingsForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable), getUniqueBindingsForOnlyVariable(), getOnlyBindingForVariable(com.cyc.kb.Variable)
